name: InjectVstsVariablesIntoRunsettings
description: Injects the current VSTS environment into a .runsettings file for providing those variables to an MSTest test run
author: West Peaks Consulting

inputs.name: SettingsFilePath
inputs.label: Path to the .runsettings file that should be updated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file system path on the build agent to the .runsettings file that's to be updated with the VSTS build / release variables. TFS Source Control paths are not supported here.
